item.title: Asymmetric Risk
item.description: Heard about this first in the podcast My First Million with the guest Mohnish Pabrai. He describes it as: “Heads I win, Tails I don’t lose much” (I love this line) I am working on becoming someone who can both recognize and act on more asymmetric opportunities as I grow.

item.title: Welcome Traveller
item.description: I’m Harsh. Welcome to my personal hypertext garden. I just started this garden, so the seeds and saplings are still growing. But check in every once in a while.
